detail_desc: Draped nursing blouse in patterned satin with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated hem.

Baby Exclusive. Cap in a striped cotton weave with elastication at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons at the front. Inset woven section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist. Side pockets, a patch back pocket with a decorative button, concealed fastenings at the crotch and down the legs and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Baby Exclusive. Jacquard-knit dress in soft organic cotton with buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves.

Mesh dress with a glitter print, wide shoulder straps and a decorative wrapover at the top. Press-studs and a detachable bow at the back, a seam at the top and a pleated skirt with a double lining for extra width. Lined.

Straight-cut dress in crinkled chiffon with lace details and a lined skirt. Deep V-neck with lacing, a seam at the waist and long sleeves with wide, buttoned lace cuffs.

Sleeveless nursing dress in patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative frill trims at the top and a sewn-on tie belt at the waist. Double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and an all-over print. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and elasticated cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved lace top with an opening and ties at the back of the neck and gathers in the sides for best fit. Lined.

Blouse in woven fabric with an opening and ties at the top, seams at the shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam under the bust with sewn-in ties at the back and a flare to the hem.
